did.unittitle: Steelworkers Organizing Committee General Meeting Minutes, 1937-1938
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Minutes of grievance committee meetings of the Steel Workers Organizing Committee (SWOC) in 1937 and 1938.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of copies of minutes of grievance meetings of the Steel Workers Organizing Committee (SWOC) in 1937 and 1938.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Steelworkers Organizing Committee General Meeting Minutes #5719. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
